issue.title: [Doc] Split release guide into maintenance and major release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16662](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16662). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current Release guide has a single documentation for both major and maintenance releases and it's difficult to follow. Split the guide in two separate parts noting the distinctions.
